title: Simulation-Based Educational Module for Responsible Antibiotic Use [Large-Scale]

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical/pharmaceutical knowledge and decision-making experience in work environments (required)
context.additional_context: VR simulation replicates antimicrobial prescription decision-making in real clinical settings, with digital device access to learning materials and task completion

learning_goals: Learners will apply appropriate criteria for antibiotic use in VR simulations with 90% accuracy.
Learners will analyze real-world cases to identify inappropriate antimicrobial prescriptions with over 80% accuracy.
Learners will explain antibiotic resistance mechanisms through a step-by-step learning module based on cognitive load theory.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
